lender.name: Jesus Hernandez, Sr.
lender.loan_because: it helps fulfill dreams. Even though we might have our personal struggles, there is always someone else who may need that extra bit of help. That is how I raised my family and that is why they use KIVA to make loans.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I can, I want to, and I feel I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a book wholesaler where I research title availability and create book lists for teachers and librarians.

lender.name: Domen
lender.loan_because: It is one of better ideas of financing. And you can be pretty sure it gets into the right hands here.

lender.name: Evil Genius
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the financial freedom to not take things so seriously.
lender.occupational_info: "Only the insane have strength enough to prosper, Only those that prosper truly judge what is sane." - Ancient Proverb

lender.name: Brock
lender.loan_because:
Practical diplomacy is the greatest way to secure concrete ties between communities. A few dollars for me might mean much more to someone without financial security.

I am 24 and from Minnesota, United States of America. I consider myself now a bank since I can loan money!
lender.occupational_info: I would give money with complete freedom of opportunity. I do not attach strings and would wish someone wasn't pressured into paying back excessive loaned funds. Education is an essential part of promoting stability across varied ethnic backgrounds.

lender.name: Knud
lender.loan_because: I wholeheartedly support the concept of micro loans. I like how it involves the people I am lending money to. It is giving them the tools to help themselves. I also like the personal nature of having a face and story to where my money is going. These are worthy people and causes.
lender.occupational_info: As a civil engineer I try to make life better for people through smart design. This program help people make their lives better through their own hands.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure what the computer system users request is what the programmers give them.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: Sustainable Global Growth & Driving Passion One Mind at a Time.
lender.occupational_info: I describe my work as a passionate marathon. Work is not a sprint. Love your personal work as this will drive your professional work.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: others have helped me
lender.occupational_info: enriching womens lives by offering opportunities

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurial efforts of those around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business student. Having examined the supply chain methods of Kiva.org, I'm fascinated by the organization's aim and its success through viral marketing.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to be born in VA, USA and live around the world. I've seen others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help make capitalism work.

lender.name: Jose Antonio
lender.loan_because: I feel that we all have the responsibility to provide others with the opportunity to better their lives by any means we can find. I believe that we are all good people by nature, and should act on that instinct.
lender.occupational_info: My work is not very traditional. I work in digital marketing, and my job is to create and discover new technologies to reach audiences targeted by our clients. Most of that means that I build interactive websites and other things as such.

lender.name: Christophe Poizat
lender.loan_because: It's important to give a chance to the largest number of entrepreneurs across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Founder/President & CEO of International Network of Social Entrepreneurs Inc., a global organization inspiring Social Entrepreneurs to connect, share, collaborate and contribute to the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) and promoting Social Entrepreneurship worldwide thru a Global Web 2.0 Community.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: Others deserve the opportunities I've had.
lender.occupational_info: Our company division contracts for the government. We build full communication systems for a wide variety of applications.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: it's better to help someone achieve a better livelihood than to just give it to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer systems that manage content for web sites and ecommerce sites.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I believe in business no matter the scale. I think the key to getting economies up and running is hard work, dedication and access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: Through Kiva, I hope to give people all over the world the gift of employment and the ability to impact there communities in a positive way.

lender.name: maggie
lender.loan_because: in the books i write and in my life i celebrate an all-embracing kinship vision, which includes every kingdom of life. i am you. you are me. also, i am delighted to be in such good company!
lender.occupational_info: my work is to inspire young people --all people--to see the beauty and interconnectedness of all life, then to think, speak and act from what they see.

lender.name: Florian
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are an extremely good idea

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who makes sure that you feel no pain, you are very comfortable and you are safe when you have an operation.

lender.name: Travis Boewadt
lender.loan_because: It's the best form of charity and foreign aid I have ever known :-)
lender.occupational_info: I serve food and beverages in a restaurant inside an American mall. I make below minimum wage and work for tips.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy going to Los Angeles Lakers games.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: a friend gave me my first KIVA loan as a gift.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: It is great way to impact people with a direct economic model. This is about people needing a little help to create their life dreams. What is so little to us is immense to them.
lender.occupational_info: My company invents, designs, manufactures, and distributes baby products. I am the president of the company.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have been so abundantly blessed by God
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students interested in health careers.

lender.name: Ward
lender.loan_because: It will return to me one day as I start my business in this small town.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: loot

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I admire people who act to better themselves.

lender.name: St. Michael Blues
lender.loan_because: I know how fortunate we are and we want to "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: We have the privilege of a strong education and work hard to learn about God, ourselves, and the world around us.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: we are one.
lender.occupational_info: I think critically and act justly.

lender.name: Issa
lender.loan_because: Helping others is something that I find immense satisfaction in. Now that I'm not a grad student anymore, I can be a philanthropist!
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from illness and disease.

lender.name: Dwayne
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes for an entrepreneur to be successful is a little help at the right moment.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs to help them start and grow their business.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: I believe in KIVA, love being a part of the KIVA community, and believe in the band that I donate on behalf of... SEETHER!!! :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a finance manager for an environmental engineering firm.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It is an extraordinary opportunity to be able to help people across the world on such a personal and individual basis.
lender.occupational_info: I start new companies involved with technology and hopefully grow them to be very large.

lender.name: playboy
lender.loan_because: i want to help someone out
lender.occupational_info: i work with nightclubs and i also make websites and blog about las vegas

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can, and in the face of the world financial crisis - this seems like a really good program.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the metropolitan railway for the City of Adelaide in South Australia

lender.name: coinr.com
lender.loan_because: The idea of helping someone start a business is like teaching them to fish. Hopefully they will be able to repay the loan and fend for themselves thereafter. It is not charity, just helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: This is part of our 2by2by2 commitment. We aim to donate 2% of staff time, 2% of product and 2% of profit.

lender.name: Elizabeth and Gordon
lender.loan_because: We like to help others earn a better living.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired teachers.

lender.name: Nanette
lender.loan_because: I know it's not much that I can lend out, but I know it's greatly appreciated and that's what makes a difference....knowing that you're helping someone that feels sincere gratitude. It is my pleasure and I wish ~All the Best~ to each and every one of the entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Fauzia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference through helping people help themselves. We all have a responsibility to give back and change the world. I've been very lucky and want to share that.

lender.name: Gill
lender.loan_because:
I want to help people.
"Whoever rescues a single life earns as much merit as though he had rescued the entire world."
lender.occupational_info: College grad, working part-time for a NYC newspaper. :)

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others to fullfill their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Spanish TV station, I create the order in which you see all programs and commercials on your TV.

lender.name: MissyT
lender.loan_because: We all struggle sometimes, and we all need help. I admire people who work hard to improve their lives and the lives of their children. In my own life, I would not have been able to get my education without a great deal of financial assistance from others, for which I'm very grateful. It's a pleasure to think that a small gesture, made together with many people, can make a difference to someone in need. Together we are strong!

lender.name: Shoji
lender.loan_because: We all have to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a musician based in Los Angeles, CA. I am co-founder of a group called On Ensemble. My music combines the taiko (Japanese drum) with many musical influences including Tuvan throat singing, Balinese gamelan and elements of hip-hop, rock and electronica.

lender.name: freedomsway Foundation
lender.loan_because: We believe micro-lending is an effective way to increase well-being in the lives of individuals and communities across the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a team of passionate and committed individuals who share a vision to make well-being accessible in all levels of society, everywhere.

lender.name: Shane Boyd
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has the right to obtain credit and have control of their own destiny.
lender.occupational_info: Advanced Eco-Accredited Tour Operator conducting 1,2 & 3 day tours to World Heritage Listed Fraser Island. Also operate a Big 4 Caravan Park and YHA Hostel on Fraser Island.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes, and this is one way I can personaly help another hard working person to improve their life.

lender.name: Jozef
lender.loan_because: Someone else could make something of the money that I have made available. It's not much, but hopefully it'll be useful.

lender.name: AYE
lender.loan_because: I want to work in Desktop Publication. So you help me to establish for a my job.
lender.occupational_info: Desktop Publication

lender.name: Huw
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a helping hand sometime.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that tries to fix contamination of the earth, water and air.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: It's time to make a difference. After all we are all one world.
lender.occupational_info: I renovate properties, subdivide, strat title & develop properties doing joint ventures or venture capital with a hands on approach [project manager].

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe helping people help themselves through micro-finance is in a lot of circumstances the most effective and empowering way to help those less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying Environmental Management - learning how to lessen our impact on the world and create a more sustainable future for all.

lender.name: Issa
lender.loan_because: I would like to give a chance to those who life didn't give them one.
lender.occupational_info: My work is challenging, dealing a lot with technology and smart systems

lender.name: Yohana
lender.loan_because: I worked with a group of women in college to assist them meet their entrepreneurial dreams. We established a Micro financing strategy that helped them begin their journey. Kiva is using the same strategy but is reaching more people than I could ever imagine. I want to be a part of it
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization as a financial analyst

lender.name: Dinesh
lender.loan_because: Together we can grow

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live in a country like Canada and want to share some of that fortune with others
lender.occupational_info: I coach young people in competitive swimming

lender.name: Jory
lender.loan_because: It's a low risk way to help individuals all over the world become self sufficient. It's an amazing way to contribute to global peace and security.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a recent graduate from Northwestern University in Evanston, IL. I'm looking to work in the non profit sector, but with the recent downturn in the U.S. economy it's proven difficult to find employment. I'm currently working as a sales associate at a furniture company named Restoration Hardware.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I appreciate what I have.

lender.name: Imelda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others around the world. I could use help but I'm sure there are many others that need more help that me sooner.
lender.occupational_info: You know the internet, well I grow that through applications and community.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing people the opportunity to create wealth and success for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I develop internet property.

lender.name: Vonna
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of helping someone make their own success.

lender.name: Randal
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Software development of websites, including internet marketing.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I want to see other people have a chance to succeed in life.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people a chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work to promote causes that serve the greater good and to advance the interests of those who are neither wealthy nor politcally powerful.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I have received so many jump starts from good people in my life. I have had to struggle hard for my College education and have never expected anything less than a struggle from life. But I also know that, having grown up in Germany and living in the United States now, my idea of a struggle is miles away from what people in other countries have grown up to expect. I return in gratitude what is possible to me because of the kindness of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to beginning College students. They learn in my class how to write good papers for all their other classes and how to express themselves credibly and professionally so that they will be taken seriously in their careers.

lender.name: Kristy-Ann
lender.loan_because: It's God's money on loan to me, the least I can do is loan it to someone else in more need than me.

lender.name: Rocio Copado
lender.loan_because: Because I can

lender.name: Rinske
lender.occupation: Real Estate Broker, Photographer, Jewelry Designer
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunities I have had in my life and wish the same for anyone else. What a nice way to assist people all over the world without making them feel that they are getting hand outs. Working towards world peace one step at the time.
lender.occupational_info:
My Real Estate work involves helping people buy and sell their home. I understand the emotions that people may have when buying or selling their home and I try to step them through the process without to much upheaval.
My other two jobs are there to satisfy my creative and artistic side.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good and fair way to give people a chance to improve the quality of their own life and their environment.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I am very excited to give to ambitious entrepreneurs who want to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell scooters and lawn mowers over the internet.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: Share good fortune.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I have been given many opportunities in my life that I am very thankful for. Now, I hope that I can give that gift to someone else.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I really enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: it's another small thing that I can do to help someone less fortunate that is trying to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: assisting adults pursuing higher education is rewarding.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I love my brothers and sisters all over the world and want to make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My husband works in financial planning and I am a stay-at-home mom to our 18 month old daughter. We are currently expecting baby number two in March 2009.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I keep the networks of my company secure.

lender.name: Frode
lender.loan_because: I loan because I'm able to - simple as that!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a rescue coordination center, planning, coordinating and directing air, sea, and land rescue operations.

lender.name: www.G-EOS.org
lender.loan_because: teaching a person to fish is good lending them the money to buy a net to actually catch fish is great
lender.occupational_info:
As a not for profit charity we provide direct support for such activities as microfinance initiatives, land preservation as well as the development of community based conservancies.
We also seek to promote geographical knowledge through two primary channels: our Educational programs and by funding Grants for research, scientific expeditions and or conservation efforts.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: scott allen
lender.loan_because: if i can help people accomplish their dreams in any way, then my life is more fulfilling.
lender.occupational_info: online home store selling home accessories, lighting and furniture. decorate interiors of homes and businesses.

lender.name: AbouBakr
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get ahead in life!
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to give, I want to help, and through Kiva I can make a difference by loaning directly to people.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to make a difference. I'm particularly interested in supporting fish farming
lender.occupational_info: I test computer software

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I protect the assets of my company from fraud, loss or theft.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: it's not my money.

lender.name: Anne Montone
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fulfill their life goals.
lender.occupational_info: I create music and share the gift I've been given with others around the world.

lender.name: dew
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people succeed

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: i care about others dreams too start there own bussness
lender.occupational_info: i go too school and work very hard at keeping my grades up

lender.name: Kosmonaut
lender.loan_because: Iam a friend of small steps. This project shows how the EVERNET possibly changes the world to the good.
lender.occupational_info: I love to give people the room to exchange there ideas in the form of film... One of my dreams is to make something cooler then kiva which is hard to find ;-)!

lender.name: Peter Matthes
lender.loan_because: I really enjoy helping good people.
lender.occupational_info: I am partly responsible for many of the ads that interrupt your favorite television shows.

lender.name: Ryan_H
lender.loan_because: my first loan was a gift from a friend
lender.occupational_info: I own a drum and recording studio and play drums for many musicians on their albums

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: it seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small family bus company in a country town.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My purpose in life is to alleviate suffering wherever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach American History at a local community college.

lender.name: Twenty2 Twenty9
lender.loan_because: In this time of economic struggle, no one knows the hardship of financing a BIG DREAM like a salon owner. A personal friend who believed in Jim and I, loaned us the money to start our hair care line. Now it's our turn to help others. Big business wouldn't help us, the little man, so we will use our good fotune to help those like us.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small, boutique hair salon. We created our own brand of hair care to sell, both retail and wholesale.

lender.name: Sithean
lender.loan_because: There have been several times in my life when things went really wrong, and I just needed a hand to turn everything around. God was always with me, and always sent me that helping hand in the form of another person or group. I want to be that type of helping hand for someone else - for a lot of someone elses.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure sick people get the right kind of medical care they need.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am an IB student. I am either studying or playing on the computer. I also volunteer for the local animal shelter.

lender.name: A.J.
lender.loan_because: I wish to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a musician. I play music, I write music, I record music. It's what I live for.

lender.name: Yale
lender.loan_because: people are less fortunate than me, and it's not their fault.
lender.occupational_info: I ate more cheese than time allowed.

lender.name: Basit
lender.loan_because: My dad started me on this, as he gave me a Kiva gift certificate. I like to help others.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: After working with immigrants for many years -- as a paralegal, teacher, and social worker -- I have a strong desire to work on the root causes of migration, such as lack of economic or educational opportunities in developing countries.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to individual lives.
lender.occupational_info: I record and sell audio books - recordings of the greatest stories ever written

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I want those with visions to be able to see them through. I believe in opportunities for everyone. I like the idea of lending without interest. I want to believe in Karma. I wish someone will be kind to me when I am in need. I want to believe in a greater good.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a custodian in a high school. When I can afford it, I would like to work in the film industry, making documentaries or video art.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: My aunt gives me kiva gift cards as christmas presents :D
lender.occupational_info: I learn in school so i can go to college next year.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: to spread the blessings God has given me!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: WalletShop.com.au is an Australian online retailer of men's wallets and accessories including laptop and mobile phone protection. We have a strong belief in giving back to the world and helping out entrepreneurs across the world where access to funds and credit is much harder to come by.

lender.name: Susan Farrar
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves. I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school age children. My goal is to help them want to be life long learners.

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because:
I want to see others succeed in their lives. It's more than just lending money, it's helping someone fulfill their dreams of a better life, and encouraging the entrepreneurial spirit.
In my photo I included my mom who came to the United States as a young girl. She married and had seven children of her own. It was not always easy for her yet she always gave with an open heart.
I realize now that no gift is too small to someone in need.
My lending through Kiva is in tribute to my mom.
lender.occupational_info:
I work as a Realtor in Oakland California. On my website, I use the slogan-Opening the door to Opportunity
I like to use the slogan for my business because I feel like I am walking people through the steps of home ownership and if done properly, owning real estate can provide opportunity for people ultimately giving them the chance of a better life.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Teaching someone to fish is much more worthwhile for everyone than giving someone money to buy a fish
lender.occupational_info: I build computer software for the Internet

lender.name: Masao
lender.loan_because: I watched KIVA on TV before, and then I've been interested in this system. Just an individual can be a sponsor. It's amazing!

lender.name: Stoian Adrian
lender.loan_because: I am more than happy to share a percent of my earnings for loans and help people all over the world
lender.occupational_info: I'm a web designer but i do various types of tasks depends on the project

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help out women in other countries who are creating a better life for themselves and their families. I feel like I am doing a small part to help make the world a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I perform on the stage, on TV, in films, and on the web, mostly in comedies. I also sing and dance so I perform in musicals for the stage. I am a writer as well, and have won awards for my poetry and essays.

lender.name: bab.la GmbH
lender.loan_because: Help people help themselves.

lender.name: Lucinda
lender.occupation: Athletic Trainer for High School Football Team

lender.name: Sherryl
lender.loan_because: This brings money directly to the people that need it. It helps people AND allows them to keep their self-respect because it is a loan not charity. When I was a PCV in India I learned 2 things. One, the money that governments send to other government rarely makes it down to the people that really need it. And two, you don't win friends with foreign aid. It makes the acceptor feel dependent and that grows into resentment. This program bypasses those problems.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: To help those in need become more productive.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy a home or sell their current home. I have been in this business for over 30 years.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: Fixing computers for a University.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have - a happy, healthy family that can afford to help someone trying to get ahead in the world with a little help to push them ahead.
lender.occupational_info: We are a .com company that serves as a marketing engine for independent restaurants. We sell gift certificates for the independent restaurants.

lender.name: Ronen
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others in need of funds, to make their life's better.
lender.occupational_info: Photographing and making documentary films and TV programs.

lender.name: Rainbow Ponies
lender.occupation: Y Princess Group in Cary, NC

lender.name: Baz
lender.loan_because: I want to give a little something back to a world where, increasingly, the poor are mercilessly exploited by corporate oligarchies and the politically corrupt and inept.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and maintain computer systems for a small manufacturing company.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become financially independent. I feel I can have a small positive impact on someones life with these loans. It is my responsibility to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business' in New Jersey figure out their health insurance plans. I also help families with their life insurance policies.

lender.name: Aya
lender.loan_because: I love People.We are the one.

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: I care about the people who are trying to start new lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to help someone "instantly". It's my habit to make a new loan on the 1st of each month, and I can hardly wait!
lender.occupational_info: I retired from teaching public school band and orchestra and now volunteer for Habitat for Humanity and a local food pantry, when i'm not managing our tree farm.

lender.name: Tebogo Schultz
lender.loan_because: I love to help people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architect / entrpreneur helping others help others.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: it's a great means of giving opportunities to people that they could not find elsewhere!
lender.occupational_info: sales

lender.name: Yehuda
lender.loan_because: We all should help
lender.occupational_info: Pilot

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe that mircofinancing is one of the best ways for individuals to make a difference in parts of the world that need our help.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help and I care.

lender.loan_because: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problems. - Gandhi

lender.occupational_info: I write software for use in hospitals.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and want others to as well

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: UU Church Of Oak Cliff
lender.loan_because: The Religious Education Ministry and the Social Justice Ministry at UUCOC partnered to loan some of the church's weekly collection. Rather than having the collection monies deposited in a savings account, we choose to invest in the future of people around the world. Teens, along with adult mentors, manage this lending group.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Unitarian Universalist Church located in the Oak Cliff community. The members of our congregation are committed to working for a just and free world & caring for the earth and each other.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: SGBoise
lender.loan_because: I believe world peace will be accomplished only when everyone focuses on opportunities instead of misfortunes.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.occupational_info: I work with young women so they may see their potential to be leaders one day!! Power to the girls!!

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what my family has and would like to help others.

lender.name: Bake
lender.loan_because: I have been given much, I too must give.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a little better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary art teacher.

lender.name: RHS Hodags
lender.loan_because: Our students select borrowers they believe will help make positive changes and improvements on global issues.
lender.occupational_info: These students are enrolled in two HS classes: Contemporary Global Issues (grades 10-12) and Global Studies (grade 9)/

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It only makes sense that to really make a difference, you have to get the money to the people.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the company I work for, more visable to those that are looking for this type of business.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: microfinance works. Everyone should be able to feed, clothe and house their family, and be proud of the success they achieve.

lender.occupational_info: network, organize, design

lender.name: Kate & Seamus
lender.loan_because: we've all been there.

lender.name: Daphne
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate - this obligates me to help others who are trying to achieve the same thing; a good life.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.whereabouts: San Jose de Mayo San Jose
lender.loan_because: God has given me the talent to write, but I need to get money to buy a laptop(Mobile Laptop) to power up of my talent as a writer and write the book so much that I have dreamed.-To be able to buy the Laptop s.1.000 need between U.S. $ and U.S. $ s.2.000 U.S. dollars.
lender.occupational_info: For me it is not a job for me is my vocation more deeply, and my dream if I can somehow impact the lives of others through my books .. that would be wonderful and made me feel in life.

lender.name: Irina
lender.loan_because: Providing the means for self-sufficiency is the way to lead people out of poverty. Food aid is not the answer.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate a network of European NGOs.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I am, first, a global citizen and, second, a socially minded business school student!
lender.occupational_info: I am in school beyond univeristy to specialize in business.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: this provides opportunities for people to support themselves and their families. I need to show God's love to others.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as an English teacher and as a postmaster in a small town in the Catskill Mountains in New York State.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I want to support small businesses, and work for women's empowerment in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a cleaner in a hotel, in a town called High Level, Alberta, Canada.

lender.name: Tony Maione
lender.loan_because:
I am lucky enough to be able to do this. It's a direct way of making a (very small) difference and it is quite fun as well so everybody is a winner!
At 90 or so loans - looking forward to making a century of loans.
lender.occupational_info: Legal practice connected with business and trade in England, UK.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I understand how hard it is to get financing to start a business. Most people just want a chance to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I install plastic liners in steel pipelines to prevent them from corroding and leaking.

lender.name: Kristjan & Linda
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel every individual has a right to better their own life and the lives of their family members and we want to help them achieve their goals.

lender.occupational_info: working my way through school. isn't everyone at my age?
